TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlException extends System.Data.Common.DbException
Public NotInheritable Class SqlException Inherits DbException
public ref class SqlException sealed : System::Data::Common::DbException

summary.span: SQL Server 返回警告或错误时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when SQL Server returns a warning or error.
This class cannot be inherited.
ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Class As Byte
public: property System::Byte Class { System::Byte get(); };

summary.span: 获取从 SQL Server .NET Framework 数据提供程序返回的错误的严重级别。

span.span: Gets the severity level of the error returned from the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server.

value.span: 一个 1 至 25 的值，它指示错误的严重级别。

span.span: A value from 1 to 25 that indicates the severity level of the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 严重性级别为 10 或更少的消息是信息性消息，并指示由用户输入的信息中的错误导致的问题。Messages that have a severity level of 10 or less are informational and indicate problems caused by mistakes in information that a user has entered. 严重级别为 11 到 16 生成的用户，并可以由用户纠正。Severity levels from 11 through 16 are generated by the user, and can be corrected by the user. 严重级别为 17 到 25 的消息指示存在软件或硬件错误。Severity levels from 17 through 25 indicate software or hardware errors. 当级别为 17 时、 18 或 19 的错误时，您可以继续工作，尽管您可能不能够执行特定语句。When a level 17, 18, or 19 error occurs, you can continue working, although you might not be able to execute a particular statement. 当严重级别为 19 或以下时， 将保持打开状态。The remains open when the severity level is 19 or less. 20 或更高版本的严重级别时，服务器通常会关闭。When the severity level is 20 or greater, the server ordinarily closes the . 但是，用户可以重新打开连接并继续操作。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. 最后两种情况下，执行该命令的方法将生成 。In both cases, a is generated by the method executing the command. 有关 SQL Server 发送的警告和信息性消息的信息，请参阅 SQL Server 文档中的故障排除部分。For information about the warning and informational messages sent by SQL Server, see the Troubleshooting section of the SQL Server documentation. 这是包装属性的第一个中属性。This is a wrapper for the property of the first in the property. ## Examples 下面的示例显示每个内集合。The following example displays each within the collection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlException.State Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlException.State Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlException.State Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlException.State Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Errors As SqlErrorCollection

summary.span: 获取由一个或多个 对象组成的集合，这些对象提供有关 SQL Server .NET Framework 数据提供程序所生成的异常的详细信息。

span.span: Gets a collection of one or more objects that give detailed information about exceptions generated by the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server.
The collected instances of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类始终包含至少一个实例的类。The class always contains at least one instance of the class. 这是包装。This is a wrapper for . SQL Server 引擎错误的详细信息，请参阅[数据库引擎错事件和错误](/sql/relational-databases/errors-events/database-engine-events-and-errors)。For more information on SQL Server engine errors, see [Database Engine Events and Errors](/sql/relational-databases/errors-events/database-engine-events-and-errors). ## Examples 下面的示例显示每个内集合。The following example displays each within the collection. .method public hidebysig virtual instance void GetObjectData(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo si, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub GetObjectData (si As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: si
param.span: 包含有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 。

span.span: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.

param.name: context
param.span: ，它包含关于源或目标的上下文信息。

span.span: The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 使用关于异常的信息设置 。

span.span: Sets the with information about the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetObjectData` 使用针对于序列化的所有异常对象数据设置 `SerializationInfo`。`GetObjectData` sets a `SerializationInfo` with all the exception object data targeted for serialization. 反序列化期间，从通过流传输的 `SerializationInfo` 重建异常。During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the `SerializationInfo` transmitted over the stream.

exception.span: 参数为 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: The parameter is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

summary.span: 获取生成错误的 Transact-SQL 批命令或存储过程内的行号。

span.span: Gets the line number within the Transact-SQL command batch or stored procedure that generated the error.

value.span: 生成错误的 Transact-SQL 批命令或存储过程内的行号。

span.span: The line number within the Transact-SQL command batch or stored procedure that generated the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置行号 1; 在启动如果返回 0，则，不适用的行号。The line numbering starts at 1; if 0 is returned, the line number is not applicable. 这是包装属性的第一个中属性。This is a wrapper for the property of the first in the property. ## Examples 下面的示例显示每个内集合。The following example displays each within the collection.
